pronunciation.pinyin: yī rén dé dào , jī quǎn shēng tiān
pronunciation.wade_giles_pinyin: yi1 ren2 de2 dao4 , ji1 quan3 sheng1 tian1

meanings.value: lit. when a man achieves the Dao, his poultry and dogs rise to Heaven
fig. to ride on sb else's success
Once one man gets a government position, all his cronies get in too
Once sb has cracked the problem, every Tom, Dick and Harry can do it
